Author: yamanala
Text: I used to have sweats and increased heartbeat after binges as well. Your body is just in a state of shock. I am a recovered bulimic and I stoped binging and purging when I leant to eat mindfully. There is an app that guides you through a series of questions and tips and teaches you to eat according to your needs. Itâ€™s not free but so worth it! Try it!   https://apps.apple.com/ca/app/am-i-hungry-virtual-coach/id848417396
Not a professional, obviously, but this has happened to me as well!! Also, sometimes I binge so fast I can't breathe, so maybe that's more of it???
